metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9893 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libseccomp before 2.4.0 did not correctly generate 64-bit syscall argument comparisons using the arithmetic operators (LT, GT, LE, GE), which might able to lead to bypassing seccomp filters and potential privilege escalations.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9893` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libseccomp2 - 2.4.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
seccomp - 2.4.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libseccomp package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.2').
